pullRequest.title: Fix SingleMapBlock.seekKeyExact bug
pullRequest.bodyText:
When seeking map key of Slice type, we need to compare the bytes value
in the key block to the key value. When the current position in the
key block is shorter than the key's length, it could return wrong
results or IndexOutOfBoundsException. This commit fixes this issue.
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

beforeCommit.message:
Fix SingleMapBlock.seekKeyExact bug

When seeking map key of Slice type, we need to compare the bytes value
in the key block to the key value. When the current position in the
key block is shorter than the key's length, it could return wrong
results or IndexOutOfBoundsException. This commit fixes this issue.

results or IndexOutOfBoundsException. This commit fixes this issue.

nodes.bodyText: @yingsu00 I don't think I understand how this works. Would you clarify? Perhaps, a unit tests would be easier to understand. What is the very long string here for?

commit.message: Change BlockBuilder's expectedEntries to be the number of values

Fix SingleMapBlock.seekKeyExact bug
